hooks.command: if [[ "$COMMAND" == *"bin/sync.py"* ]]; then tail -n 20 logs/scraper.log | grep -E '(ERROR|CRITICAL|Cloudflare)' || true; fi
hooks.description: Check for errors in scraper log after running sync commands

hooks.command: if [[ "$FILEPATH" == *.py ]]; then python -m py_compile "$FILEPATH" 2>/dev/null || echo 'Warning: Python syntax check failed'; fi
hooks.description: Run Python syntax check before writing Python files

hooks.command: test -f .env && grep -q 'GEMINI_API_KEY' .env && grep -q 'SUPABASE_URL' .env || echo 'Warning: Missing required environment variables in .env'
hooks.description: Ensure required environment variables are set
